description:
Big Money Company shows up at to help pick tea at the plantation owned by Fukuta`s relatives to earn a reward. The manual labor is harder than they expect, leaving them dripping in sweat, and they experience just how hard it is to earn money. What should be a small issue turns into a huge fight due to Nagare being absent from his cram school training camp. If it`s come to this, better settle it with a Hero Battle!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Money Company Breakup! Tea Picking Battle Royale!
ガッポリカンパニー解散 ￥ おちゃつみバトルロイヤル!!
